source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse scenery shot of a powerful supercell thunderstorm forming over a vast, flat, green field. The dramatic, dark clouds churn and swirl as the storm system evolves. Rain can be seen falling in the distance as the entire formation moves across the horizon.

source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a time-lapse scenery shot of a powerful supercell thunderstorm forming over a vast, flat, green field. The dramatic, dark clouds churn and swirl as the storm system evolves. Rain can be seen falling in the distance as the entire formation moves across the horizon.

generated_critique: The caption generally follows the instruction by describing the motion of the storm clouds in chronological order, noting the formation, churning, swirling, and movement across the horizon, as well as the visible rain. However, the phrase "dramatic, dark clouds" uses an emotional adjective ("dramatic"), which should be avoided. The caption could be improved by specifying the sequence of motion more clearly, such as: "The clouds gradually build and thicken, then begin to rotate and swirl as the storm intensifies, with rain falling in the distance while the entire system moves steadily across the horizon." Remove subjective language and ensure the description is strictly focused on observable motion.
